details.name: The Walt Disney Company
details.description:
The Walt Disney Company, commonly just Disney (/ˈdɪzni/),[2] is an American multinational entertainment and media conglomerate headquartered at the Walt Disney Studios complex in Burbank, California.
Disney was originally founded on October 16, 1923, by brothers Walt and Roy O. Disney as the "Disney Brothers Cartoon Studio";[3] it also operated under the names "The Walt Disney Studio" and "Walt Disney Productions" before officially changing its name to The Walt Disney Company in 1986. The company established itself as a leader in the American animation industry before diversifying into live-action film production, television, and theme parks.
Since the 1980s, Disney has created and acquired corporate divisions in order to market more mature content than is typically associated with its flagship family-oriented brands. The company is known for its film studio division, The Walt Disney Studios, which includes Walt Disney Pictures, Walt Disney Animation Studios, Pixar, Marvel Studios, Lucasfilm, 20th Century Studios, 20th Century Animation, and Searchlight Pictures. Disney's other main business units include divisions in television, broadcasting, streaming media, theme park resorts, consumer products, publishing, and international operations. Through these various segments, Disney owns and operates the ABC broadcast network; cable television networks such as Disney Channel, ESPN, Freeform, FX, and National Geographic; publishing, merchandising, music, and theater divisions; direct-to-consumer streaming services such as Disney+, Star+, ESPN+, Hulu, and Hotstar; and Disney Parks, Experiences and Products, a group of 14 theme parks, resort hotels, and cruise lines around the world.[4][5] Cartoon character Mickey Mouse, created in 1928 by Walt Disney and Ub Iwerks, serves as the company's official mascot.[6]
The company, which trades on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) under DIS stock symbol,[7] has been a component of the Dow Jones Industrial Average since 1991.[8] In August 2020, just under two-thirds of the stock was owned by large financial institutions.[9]

Tokyo Disney Resort.name: Tokyo Disney Resort
Tokyo Disney Resort.description: 東京ディズニーリゾートでは、遊ぶこと、泊まること、食べること、ショッピング、すべてがエンターテイメント！東京ディズニーランド、東京ディズニーシーの2つのテーマパークを中心とした滞在型テーマリゾートです。

ESPN PLUS.name: ESPN+
ESPN PLUS.description: Stream exclusive live sports from UFC, Baseball, College Basketball, Soccer, Golf, and more. Plus, get ESPN+ for the cost of $6.99 monthly or $69.99 with an annual subscription

Disney Music Group.name: Disney Music
Disney Music Group.description: Listen to songs, browse albums, and watch music videos from your favorite Disney artists!

Walt Disney Animation Studios.name: Walt Disney Animation Studios
Walt Disney Animation Studios.description: The official site of Walt Disney Animation Studios. Walt Disney Animation Studios is a filmmaker-driven animation studio responsible for creating some of the most beloved films ever made. Located in California, Disney Animation continues to build on its rich legacy of innovation and creativity, from the first fully-animated feature film– 1937's Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs– to 2019's Frozen 2.

WDI.description: Disney Parks, Experiences and Consumer Products brings Disney’s stories, characters and franchises to life through Parks and Resorts, toys, apps, apparel, books and stores.

Disney+.description: Disney+ is the home for your favorite movies and TV shows from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and National Geographic. Sign up for Disney+ and start streaming today.

Final Hotstar lockup.description: Watch latest TV shows, movies and live cricket on Hotstar - premium Indian streaming platform with more than 100,000 hours of drama and movies in 8 languages.

hd14180.description: Welcome to the official website of Disneyland Paris. Discover 2 Disney Parks, 7 Disney Hotels, a golf course and  Disney Village for even more magic and fun.

2018 abc news promo black.description: Your trusted source for breaking news, analysis, exclusive interviews, headlines, and videos at ABCNews.com

MARVEL STUDIOS.name: Marvel Entertainment
MARVEL STUDIOS.description: Explore Marvel movies & the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) on the official site of Marvel Entertainment!

Aulani.name: Aulani Hawaii Resort
Aulani.description: Aulani, a Disney Resort & Spa in Ko Olina, is the place to stay for a Hawaii family vacation that immerses you in local culture through Disney magic.

Shop Disney TDS Blue.description: Disney Store online is now shopDisney.com, the ultimate Disney shopping destination! Shop for costumes, clothes, toys, collectibles, decor, movies and more at shopDisney.

hulu.description: Watch TV shows and movies online. Stream TV episodes of Grey's Anatomy, This Is Us, Bob's Burgers, Brooklyn Nine-Nine, Empire, SNL, and popular movies on your favorite devices. Start your free trial now. Cancel anytime.

Shanghai Disney Resort.name: Shanghai Disney Resort
Shanghai Disney Resort.description: Welcome to Shanghai Disney Resort, a one-of-a-kind destination featuring Shanghai Disneyland, 2 Resort hotels, Disneytown, Wishing Star Park and much more!

20th century studios.name: 20th Century Studios
20th century studios.description: The Official Website for all movies from 20th Century Studios. Shop for movies on Blu-ray, DVD, 4K Ultra HD, or Digital.

SLP.name: Searchlight Pictures
SLP.description: We're Searchlight Pictures, the studio that brought you 12 Years A Slave, The Grand Budapest Hotel, Wild, Birdman, Slumdog Millionaire, and Little Miss Sunshine.

Disney Publishing Worldwide.name: Disney Books
Disney Publishing Worldwide.description: Browse thousands of books for all ages featuring your favorite characters from Disney, Star Wars, Marvel, Pixar, and more!

Lucasfilm.name: Lucasfilm
Lucasfilm.description: Founded in 1971, Lucasfilm is one of the world's leading entertainment companies and home to the legendary Star Wars and Indiana Jones franchises.

ESPN.name: ESPN
ESPN.description: Visit ESPN to get up-to-the-minute sports news coverage, scores, highlights and commentary for NFL, MLB, NBA, College Football, NCAA Basketball and more.

details.name: PepsiCo
details.description:
PepsiCo, Inc. is an American multinational food, snack, and beverage corporation headquartered in Harrison, New York, in the hamlet of Purchase. PepsiCo's business encompasses all aspects of the food and beverage market. It oversees the manufacturing, distribution, and marketing of its products. PepsiCo was formed in 1965 with the merger of the Pepsi-Cola Company and Frito-Lay, Inc. PepsiCo has since expanded from its namesake product Pepsi Cola to an immensely diversified range of food and beverage brands. The largest and most recent acquisition was Tropicana Products in 1998 and the Quaker Oats Company in 2001, which added the Gatorade brand to the Pepsi portfolio.
As of January 2021, the company possesses 23 brands that have over $1 billion in sales.[2] Pepsico has operations all around the world and its products were distributed across more than 200 countries, resulting in annual net revenues of over $70 billion. Based on net revenue, profit, and market capitalization; PepsiCo is the second-largest food and beverage business in the world, behind Nestlé. PepsiCo's flagship product Pepsi Cola has been engaged in a rivalry for generations with Coca-Cola, commonly referred to as the Soda Wars. Despite Coca-Cola outselling Pepsi Cola in the United States, PepsiCo within the North American market is the largest food and beverage company by net revenue. Ramon Laguarta has been the chief executive of PepsiCo since 2018. The company's beverage distribution and bottling is conducted by PepsiCo as well as by licensed bottlers in certain regions.
Pepsi has been repeatedly criticized by environmentalists for its relationship to negative environmental impacts of agriculture in its supply chain, and distributing operations such as palm oil-related deforestation and pesticide use, its use of water resources, and the negative impacts of its packaging—Pepsi's packaging has consistently been one of the top sources of plastic pollution globally.[3]  Similarly public health advocates have criticized Pepsi's high-calorie, poor nutrition product lines along with other popular snack and drink manufacturers. In response, PepsiCo has made public comments on their commitment to minimizing their impact but has not released public information documenting progress on most of its public commitments.

pure-leaf.name: Pure Leaf
pure-leaf.description: Pure Leaf brews premium iced tea from real tea leaves and follows a simple and authentic  process that comes from a passion for realness.

lay-s.name: Lay's
lay-s.description: Wherever celebrations and good times happen, the LAY'S® brand will be there just as it has been for more than 75 years. With flavors almost as rich as our history, we have a chip or crisp flavor guaranteed to bring a smile on your face.

lifewtr.name: LIFEWTR
lifewtr.description: LIFEWTR is premium bottled water that fuses creativity and design to serve as a source of inspiration as well as hydration. LIFEWTR is a purified water, pH balanced with electrolytes added for taste.

starbucks.name: Starbucks
starbucks.description: More than twenty years ago, Starbucks and PepsiCo started the North America Coffee Partnership and launched Starbucks Bottled Frappuccino chilled coffee drink. What started out as a nascent category has grown to be more than 40 ready-to-drink Starbucks beverages and more than $2 billion in retail business.

mountain-dew.name: Mountain Dew
mountain-dew.description: The original, the one that started it all. MTN DEW exhilarates and quenches with its one of a kind taste.

cheetos.name: Cheetos
cheetos.description: CHEETOS® snacks are the much-loved cheesy treats that are fun for everyone! You just can’t eat a CHEETOS® snack without licking the signature “cheetle” off your fingertips. And wherever the CHEETOS® brand and CHESTER CHEETAH® go, cheesy smiles are sure to follow.

nut-harvest.name: Nut Harvest
nut-harvest.description: Whether you’re going for a run or heading out to run errands, “on the go” shouldn’t mean going without the snacks that keep you going! Our nuts, trail mixes and seeds are a tasty way to stay satisfied while you’re out and about.

life.name: Life
life.description: Life cereal is the crunchy wholesome choice that's great for the whole family to enjoy. Each tasty square features whole grains so you can savor the sweet moments that bring your family together.

pearl-milling-company.name: Pearl Milling Company
pearl-milling-company.description: New name, same great taste you know and love. Pearl Milling Company® easy-to-prepare mixes, syrups, cornmeal mixes, and grits have been a part of special family moments for over a century. Learn more about the brand’s changes here.

bubly.name: bubly
bubly.description: bubly is an unsweetened sparkling water that playfully instigates fun and positivity in everyday life. Available in eight flavors, bubly sparkling water pairs crisp, sparkling water with natural fruit flavors to provide a delicious taste with no calories, no sweeteners, all smiles.

tropicana.name: Tropicana
tropicana.description: We've been making orange juice for nearly 70 years and still bring the same passion to the process as when we first started. See what we are doing to bring you the best-tasting, most nutritious orange juice possible.

doritos.name: Doritos
doritos.description: The DORITOS® brand is all about boldness. If you’re up to the challenge, grab a bag of DORITOS® tortilla chips and get ready to make some memories you won’t soon forget. It’s a bold experience in snacking and beyond.

quaker.name: Quaker
quaker.description: For more than 140 years, Quaker has been the leading expert in oats, combining science, scale, passion, and expertise, and dedicated to determining ways to transform the oat into products that help people benefit from their goodness.

aquafina.name: Aquafina
aquafina.description: Aquafina’s reverse osmosis purification system means perfect taste every time.

soda-stream.name: Soda Stream
soda-stream.description: Turn regular water into sparkling water at the touch of a button with SodaStream®. You drink more water when it’s exciting, so dress up your glass, and show you’re high class with better bubbles. Add a squeeze of fresh fruit or a drop of natural flavor for a better way to hydrate. Plus, when you use SodaStream reusable bottles your choices are better for you and better for the planet.

ruffles.name: Ruffles
ruffles.description: With crunchy ridges and epic inspired flavors, RUFFLES® potato chips bring snack satisfaction and big taste to any moment.

brisk.name: Brisk
brisk.description: Brisk has become the badge of creative hustlers everywhere, and we're damn proud of it. By bringing in-your-face flavors, vibrant colors, and dynamic packaging to the juice drink and iced tea game, we attract anyone pushing themselves to make their mark on the world.

sun-chips.name: SunChips
sun-chips.description: SUNCHIPS® snacks are wavy, ripple-y squares full of whole-grain goodness (19g of whole grains per serving). Grab a bag of SUNCHIPS® multigrain snacks in your favorite flavor, and tell your taste buds to meet you at the corner of delicious and wholesome.

naked.name: Naked
naked.description: Naked has a deep tradition of goodness. For more than 30 years, we have been committed to giving consumers easy access to the best fruits and vegetables.

ke-vita.name: KeVita
ke-vita.description: KeVita is a leader in fermented probiotic and kombucha beverages with three refreshingly accessible product lines and billions of live probiotics in every bottle. With over two dozen flavors of Sparkling Probiotic Drink, Master Brew Kombucha and Apple Cider Vinegar Tonic, all KeVita drinks are USDA Certified Organic, non-GMO Project Verified and gluten-free.

o-n-e.name: O.N.E
o-n-e.description: Made from the best coconuts, O.N.E. has a vibrant coconut flavor. O.N.E. pure coconut water is refreshing and hydrating, helping to inspire and power your ONE thing.

7-up.name: 7UP
7-up.description: 7UP is one of PepsiCo’s billion dollar brands present across more than 140 countries outside of the U.S. It’s an authentic trademark with strong heritage, equity since 1929

simply.name: Simply
simply.description: Simply put, SIMPLY snacks have a great taste, with no artificial flavors or colors to get in the way. They’re the ones that make you feel good about sharing with the people you love most!

imag-ne.name: Imag!ne
imag-ne.description: Imag!ne snacks are lip-smackingly delicious snacks that are a good source of protein or calcium. Our clever snacks are proof that food made with real ingredients, like cheese, apples and cranberries, can be totally scrumptious and convenient for snack-time with no artificial colors or flavors and Non-GMO Project Verified.

near-east.name: Near East
near-east.description: The Near East® family of products includes more than 30 different varieties of rice pilaf, couscous, quinoa blends, and other grain dishes. Our easy-to-prepare products are made with high quality ingredients and feature authentic flavors from around the world.

fritos.name: Fritos
fritos.description: The popularity of FRITOS® corn chips puts this iconic snack in a class of its own. From small towns and family barbecues to parties in the big city, this classic snack is still satisfying fans after more than 80 years.

bare-snacks.name: Bare Snacks
bare-snacks.description: At Bare, we believe the less you add, the more you actually taste. We slice real fruit and veggies and bake them up slowly for a one-of-a-kind crunch. Snacks gone simple®.

tostitos.name: Tostitos
tostitos.description: TOSTITOS® are more than tortilla chips and dips – they’re an invitation to catch up with friends, so Get Together Already™!

off-the-eaten-path.name: Off the Eaten Path
off-the-eaten-path.description: Hungry for a new adventure? Try Off the Eaten Path – deliciously different from chips. You’ll discover a new take on Real Veggies like green peas, yellow peas and black beans. Keep feeding your curious!

gatorade.name: Gatorade
gatorade.description: With a legacy over 50 years in the making, it’s the most scientifically researched and game-tested way to replace electrolytes lost in sweat. Gatorade Thirst Quencher is specifically made to keep you hydrated, which is why it’s trusted by some of the world’s best athletes.

propel.name: Propel
propel.description: Give your workout a boost of fruit flavor. Each of Propel's eight flavors provide electrolytes while also providing vitamin B and antioxidant vitamins C and E so you can hydrate, replenish and get your best workout without adding calories.

diet-pepsi.name: Diet Pepsi
diet-pepsi.description: With its light, crisp taste, Diet Pepsi gives you all the refreshment you need - with zero sugar, zero calories and zero carbs. Light. Crisp. Refreshing. Diet Pepsi.

stacy-s.name: Stacy's
stacy-s.description: STACY’S® pita chips and thins, real pita bread twice baked for incredible crunch.

cracker-jack.name: Cracker Jack
cracker-jack.description: The CRACKER JACK® brand has been an American favorite for 120 years. The delicious blend of caramel coated popcorn and peanuts is just as good as you remember. And, as if a tasty snack weren’t enough, who can forget the thrill of opening the surprise inside?

matador.name: Matador
matador.description: Matador® beef jerky is made with 100% beef to help you get the most out of every day. Sunup to sundown. So from work to play, Charge Forward™ every single day and steer life where you want it to go.

lipton.name: Lipton
lipton.description: With more than 125 years of experience, Lipton is one of the world's great refreshment brands, with tea-based drinks including leaf tea, infusions, and ready-to-drink iced tea.

sierra-mist.name: Sierra Mist
sierra-mist.description: Crisp lemon lime flavored refreshment made with real sugar.

rice-a-roni-and-pasta-roni.name: Rice-A-Roni and Pasta Roni
rice-a-roni-and-pasta-roni.description: Rice-A-Roni® and Pasta Roni® offer easy-to-prepare side dishes in various flavors you’ll love to help delight your family with a delicious dinner. It’s The San Francisco Treat!

izze.name: IZZE
izze.description: IZZE drinks are a simple mix including 70% fruit juice and a splash of sparkling water. With no preservatives and no added sugar, IZZE is the perfect feel-good drink to brighten up your days.

so-be-elixirs-and-teas.name: SoBe Elixirs® & Teas
so-be-elixirs-and-teas.description:
Our story began in 1995, when our founders dreamt up a flavorful concoction inspired by the sun-drenched beaches and laidback vibes of South Beach, Florida.  Our first drink, SOBE® Black Tea 3G, was an unheard of blend of Ginseng, Guarana and herbal ingredients.  Today we offer a diverse range of SOBE ELIXIR® and Tea products that are defined by exotic flavor combinations. Unapologetically bold and wickedly tasty, SOBE® beverages are refreshing and delight the taste buds with an insane rush of flavor.

Enjoyed on their own or expertly remixed, SOBE ELIXIR® and Tea products aren’t for the faint of heart.  Our crazy concoctions cater to all the daredevils and the adventure seekers out there.  So go ahead and Ride The Wild!

santitas.name: Santitas
santitas.description: Just like the tortilla chips in your favorite Mexican restaurant, the authentic flavor of SANTITAS® tortilla chips starts with high-quality, stone-ground corn. Just add salsa or guacamole on the side for a party snack that can’t be beat!

stubborn-soda.name: STUBBORN SODA
stubborn-soda.description: STUBBORN SODA is made with high quality ingredients, natural flavors, and without artificial sweeteners. Because when it comes to creating something great, you’ve got to do it the STUBBORN way.

pepsi-black.name: Pepsi Black
pepsi-black.description: Introducing the next generation Cola for the next generation of Cola drinkers. Pepsi Black delivers Maximum Taste with No Sugar. Go All In #FORTHELOVEOFIT.

smart50.name: Smart50
smart50.description: Seriously delicious popcorn at 50 calories per cup or less.

sabritones.name: Sabritones
sabritones.description: SABRITONES® snacks are traditional puffed wheat snacks from Mexico. With authentic flavors like spicy chilies and tangy lime, it’s a treat that’s sure to make your mouth water.

smartfood.name: Smartfood
smartfood.description: As America’s favorite popcorn brand, our fresh-tasting, light-textured SMARTFOOD® varieties always seem to keep the fun popping. In our book, being smart is always in great taste.

funyuns.name: Funyuns
funyuns.description: FUNYUNS® Onion Flavored Rings are a deliciously different snack that’s fun to eat, with a crisp texture and zesty onion flavor. Next time you're in the mood for a tasty treat that's out of the ordinary, try FUNYUNS® Onion Flavored Rings.

sabra.name: Sabra
sabra.description: Sabra makes America’s favorite hummus in more than a dozen delicious varieties. All of Sabra’s products are made with fresh ingredients you can feel good about, including plant-based foods that are non-GMO, vegan, gluten-free, kosher, and organic.

rold-gold.name: Rold Gold
rold-gold.description: Between the one-of-a-kind flavor and crispy texture of ROLD GOLD® pretzels, you just might fall in love with this golden-baked snack all over again every time you take a break. Try them with peanut butter, hummus or on their own to take your break to a whole new level!

maui-style.name: Maui Style
maui-style.description: Check out the outrageous taste of MAUI STYLE® potato chips, with flavors more classic than the tasty waves off Honolua Bay, and a fresh taste that captures the spirit of MAUI STYLE.

miss-vickie-s.name: Miss Vickie's
miss-vickie-s.description: Kettle cooked potato chips made with love and care since 1987. No artificial preservatives or flavors.

walkers.name: Walkers
walkers.description: Since 1948, we’ve been delighting the nation everyday with our delicious great tasting crisps. We strive to always give you the very best quality and continue to be made with 100% Great British Potatoes.

grandma-s-cookies.name: Grandma's Cookies
grandma-s-cookies.description: GRANDMA’S® cookies offer a delicious variety of memories. With flavors like chocolate, peanut butter and lemon pie, every GRANDMA’S treat is baked with love to transport you to your happy place with every bite.

quaker-rice-crisps-and-rice-cakes.name: Quaker Rice Crisps & Rice Cakes
quaker-rice-crisps-and-rice-cakes.description: Quaker’s Rice Crisps and Rice Cakes are delicious and crunchy gluten free snacks popped and baked to the pinnacle of crispiness. With several sweet and savory flavors, there’s one for every snacking occasion.

munchos.name: Munchos
munchos.description: When you want a snack packed with potato flavor and a crispy crunch, reach for a snack of MUNCHOS® potato crisps. It’s a one-two combination of mouthwatering taste and satisfying crunch!

quaker-chewy-granola-bars.name: Quaker Chewy Granola Bars
quaker-chewy-granola-bars.description: Quaker Chewy Granola bars are a fun and convenient snack made with whole grains, other delicious ingredients and no high fructose corn syrup. With delicious flavors like Chocolate Chip, Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip and Oatmeal Raisin, there’s bound to be a flavor for everyone in the family to love!

mug.name: MUG
mug.description: Everything about Mug Root Beer appeals to the senses: the rich foam, the unique aroma and the feeling of ice-cold refreshment. Mug's extra-creamy vanilla flavor and unique blend of sweetness and spice have been creating memories for nearly 80 years.

mirinda.name: Mirinda
mirinda.description: Mirinda is a fun brand that captures love for fruity flavors through vibrant, delicious fruity offerings. With over 44+ flavors globally, Mirinda is a billion dollar PepsiCo brand with presence in over 100 countries.

red-rock-deli.name: Red Rock Deli
red-rock-deli.description: With each bite of Red Rock Deli potato chips, consumers will be immersed in a flavor-filled journey – from the savory taste of Himalayan Pink Salt to a perfectly powerful combination of Red Curry and Coconut, to the invigorating fresh taste of Lime and Cracked Pepper. Each variety combines distinct flavor profiles with a velvety crunch.

munchies.name: Munchies
munchies.description: Inside each bag of MUNCHIES® snacks, you’ll find a tasty mix of some of your favorite snack brands, including SUNCHIPS®, DORITOS®, ROLD GOLD® and CHEETOS® snacks! Grab a bag for a flavor combination that’s hard to beat!

cap-n-crunch.name: Cap'n Crunch
cap-n-crunch.description: Sweet and golden, with a crunch you can’t resist, nothing competes with the original Cap’n Crunch®. Grab a bowl or cup for an easy snack that goes great with couch time, anytime.

diet-mountain-dew.name: Diet Mountain Dew
diet-mountain-dew.description: All the great, exhilarating taste of MTN DEW with zero calories.
